questions.question: Which of the following words can be used to refer to a speaker who does not use more words than necessary?
questions.description: The adjective laconic is used to refer to people who say very little, but mean much.

questions.question: Which of the following words can be used to refer to a man who excessively caters to, worships and submits to the most outlandish or outrageous demands of his wife?
questions.description: There is a difference between the words henpecked and uxorious. A henpecked husband is dominated by his wife. An uxorious husband is dominated by his neurosis, and his wife may not enjoy his uxoriousness.

questions.question: Which of the following words is synonymous with alcoholism?
questions.description: Dipsomania is the morbid compulsion to keep on drinking alcoholic beverages.

questions.question: Which of the following words can be used to refer to people who have delusions about their invincibility?
questions.description: Megalomaniacs are people who have delusions about their invincibility.

questions.question: Which of the following words can be used to refer to a person who fears shut-in or crowded places?
questions.description: A claustrophobe is a person who fears being shut-in or being in crowded places.

questions.question: A person who sneers at convention and tradition is a/an ……………………………
questions.description: An iconoclast is a person who sneers at convention and tradition.

questions.question: A person who has morbid anxiety about his or her health is a /an ………………………….
questions.description: A hypochondriac is a person who has morbid anxiety about his/her health.

questions.question: Which of the following words is used to refer to the act of killing one’s wife?
questions.description: Uxoricide is the act of killing one’s wife.

questions.question: Which of the following words can be used to refer to a person who is a strict disciplinarian?
Which of the following words can be used to refer to a person who tends to fixate obsessively over one thing?
questions.description: A monomaniac is a person who tends to fixate obsessively over one thing.

questions.question: Which of the following words can be used to refer to an accomplished musician?
questions.description: A virtuoso is an accomplished musician and performer.

questions.question: Which of the following words can be used to refer to an old man in a ruling position?
questions.description: A patriarch is an old man in a ruling position.
